descriptions.title: Actual Empowerment
descriptions.content:
Description

This is one of the four empowerments (dbang bzhi) of the anuttarayoga tantric system. The actual empowerment is usually found in texts with titles such as dbang or dbang chog, although rarely one finds a text on the actual initiation apart from the preliminaries.

Example Texts

  • Mi tra brgya rtsa'i bla med kyi dbang chog dngos gzhi ngag 'don gyi rim par bsgrigs pa
